page.title: 11THE BLUE BELL HOTEL (cont.)
page.content: The present owner of the Blue Bell, Mr. Chew, has owned it for over 20 years and he makes an annual cash turn over of the Blue Bell of half a million pounds. They serve 200 bar snacks a day and it has eight types of beer. The Blue Bell is a Free-House and can take l04 cars in their car park. The Blue Bell is still a hotel and has 28 bedrooms in it and they have such facilities as toilet, shower, bath and double bed with intercom, radio, side-lights and television and people can stay as long as they please. The Blue Bell is also a restaurant and sells 58 types of wines and 22 types of meals which the dearest (dinner) is Â£ll.00. The Blue Bell's fire precautions are smoke-sensors and central-wired fire doors as well as alarms and bells. The Blue Bell has not had many
